/-- Lemma 5.6.5 (Existence of n^th roots) -/
theorem rootset_nonempty {x : Real} (hx : x ≥ 0) (n : ℕ) (hn : n ≥ 1) : {y : Real | y ≥ 0 ∧ y ^ n ≤ x}.Nonempty :=
  by
  use 0
  sorry

signature.pp: {x : Real} (n : ℕ) (hn : n ≥ 1) : BddAbove {y : Real | y ≥ 0 ∧ y ^ n ≤ x}

ref.pp:
theorem rootset_bddAbove {x : Real} (n : ℕ) (hn : n ≥ 1) : BddAbove {y : Real | y ≥ 0 ∧ y ^ n ≤ x} := by
  -- This proof is written to follow the structure of the original text.
  
  rw [_root_.bddAbove_def]
  obtain h | h := le_or_gt x 1
  . use 1; intro y hy; simp at hy
    by_contra! hy'
    replace hy' : 1 < y ^ n := by sorry
    linarith
  use x; intro y hy; simp at hy
  by_contra! hy'
  replace hy' : x < y ^ n := by sorry
  linarith

ref.pp:
theorem eq_quot (q : ℚ) : ∃ a : ℤ, ∃ b : ℕ, b > 0 ∧ q = a / b :=
  by
  use q.num, q.den; have := q.den_nz
  refine ⟨by omega, (Rat.num_div_den q).symm⟩

signature.pp:
{a a' : ℤ} {b b' : ℕ} (hb : b > 0) (hb' : b' > 0) (hq : (a / b : ℚ) = (a' / b' : ℚ)) {x : Real} (hx : x > 0) :
  (x.root b') ^ (a') = (x.root b) ^ (a)

ref.pp:
/-- Lemma 5.6.8 -/
theorem pow_root_eq_pow_root {a a' : ℤ} {b b' : ℕ} (hb : b > 0) (hb' : b' > 0) (hq : (a / b : ℚ) = (a' / b' : ℚ))
    {x : Real} (hx : x > 0) : (x.root b') ^ (a') = (x.root b) ^ (a) := by
  -- This proof is written to follow the structure of the original text.
  
  wlog ha : a > 0 generalizing a b a' b'
  . simp at ha
    obtain ha | ha := le_iff_lt_or_eq.mp ha
    . replace hq : ((-a : ℤ) / b : ℚ) = ((-a' : ℤ) / b' : ℚ) := by push_cast at *; ring_nf at *; simp [hq]
      specialize this hb hb' hq (by linarith)
      simpa [zpow_neg] using this
    have : a' = 0 := by sorry
    simp_all
  have : a' > 0 := by sorry
  field_simp at hq
  lift a to ℕ using by order
  lift a' to ℕ using by order
  norm_cast at *
  set y := x.root (a * b')
  have h1 : y = (x.root b').root a := by rw [root_root, mul_comm] <;> linarith
  have h2 : y = (x.root b).root a' := by rw [root_root, mul_comm, ← hq] <;> linarith
  have h3 : y ^ a = x.root b' := by rw [h1]; apply pow_of_root (root_nonneg _ _) <;> linarith
  have h4 : y ^ a' = x.root b := by rw [h2]; apply pow_of_root (root_nonneg _ _) <;> linarith
  rw [← h3, pow_mul, mul_comm, ← pow_mul, h4]

signature.pp: {x : Real} (hx : x > 0) (a : ℤ) {b : ℕ} (hb : b > 0) : x ^ (a / b : ℚ) = (x.root b) ^ a

ref.pp:
theorem ratPow_def {x : Real} (hx : x > 0) (a : ℤ) {b : ℕ} (hb : b > 0) : x ^ (a / b : ℚ) = (x.root b) ^ a :=
  by
  set q := (a / b : ℚ)
  convert pow_root_eq_pow_root hb _ _ hx
  . have := q.den_nz; omega
  rw [Rat.num_div_den q]
